[Presidential elections](/wiki/Presidential_elections_in_Singapore) - [General elections](/wiki/General_elections_in_Singapore) Singapore portal - [Other countries](/wiki/Outline_of_political_science#Politics_by_region) - v - t - e This is a **list of parliamentary by-elections in Singapore** since 1965, with the names of the incumbent and victor and their respective parties. Where seats changed [political party](/wiki/Political_party) at the election, the result is highlighted: blue for a [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) gain and red for a [Workers' Party](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore) gain. There have been a total of 31 by-elections. The first was held in January 1966 and the most recent in May 2016. ## By-elections Source: ### 13th Parliament By-electionDateIncumbentPartyWinnerPartyCause[Bukit Batok SMC](/wiki/2016_Bukit_Batok_by-election)7 May 2016[David Ong](/wiki/David_Ong)[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Murali Pillai](/wiki/Murali_Pillai)[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Resignation (due to personal indiscretions) ### 12th Parliament By-electionDateIncumbentPartyWinnerPartyCause[Punggol East SMC](/wiki/2013_Punggol_East_by-election)26 January 2013[Michael Palmer](/wiki/Michael_Palmer_(politician))[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee Li Lian](/wiki/Lee_Li_Lian)[Workers' Party of Singapore](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Resignation (due to personal indiscretions)[Hougang SMC](/wiki/2012_Hougang_by-election)27 May 2012[Yaw Shin Leong](/wiki/Yaw_Shin_Leong)[Workers' Party of Singapore](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)[Png Eng Huat](/wiki/Png_Eng_Huat)[Workers' Party of Singapore](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Resignation (due to personal indiscretions) ### 8th Parliament By-electionDateIncumbentPartyWinnerPartyCause[Marine Parade GRC](/wiki/1992_Marine_Parade_by-election)19 December 1992[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) Lim Chee Onn Othman Haron Eusofe [Matthias Yao](/wiki/Matthias_Yao)[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) Othman Haron Eusofe [Teo Chee Hean](/wiki/Teo_Chee_Hean) [Matthias Yao](/wiki/Matthias_Yao)[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Resignation (for renewal of party ranks and to recontest) ### 5th Parliament By-electionDateIncumbentPartyWinnerPartyCause[Anson SMC](/wiki/1981_Anson_by-election)31 October 1981[Devan Nair](/wiki/Devan_Nair)[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[J. title: List of by-elections in Singapore
